parameters.name: byteToBool
parameters.doc:
Whether bytes with the value 0 and 1 should get booleans in the resulting json. This is here because nbt has no boolean
type and uses byte instead.

doc.summary: Transforms the given nbt to a JsonElement.
doc.text: Transforms the given nbt to a JsonElement.

doc.summary: Provides a way to convert NBT to json just as JsonToNBT does the other way round.
doc.text: Provides a way to convert NBT to json just as JsonToNBT does the other way round.

properties.text: It never worked consistently. Take a look at <ref cls="com/mojang/serialization/Codec">codecs</ref> to solve things like this.
